name: badminton scoreboard
description: A web app for counting scores for singles or doubles badminton matches according to the BWF official rules. Built with Vue.

name: crack the code game
description: A number guessing game. This was a mini game that I loved to play on my electronic dictionary 20 years ago. Built with Vanilla JS.

name: frontend mentor collection
description: This is a collection page showcasing my work of completing front-end coding challenges from Frontend Mentor.
